Detailed Description

Package plugin module Module that handles packages

Define Documentation

#define orxPACKAGE_KU32_FLAG_LOCATION_EXTERN   0x00000002

file outside the compiled archive

#define orxPACKAGE_KU32_FLAG_LOCATION_INTERN   0x00000001

file inside the compiled archive

#define orxPACKAGE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_READ   0x00000004

package opened in read mode

#define orxPACKAGE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_WRITE   0x00000008

package opened in write mode

Closes a package

Parameters:

orxCONST orxSTRING  _zFileName 
)

Commits a file in the package

Parameters:
_pstPackage (IN) Package to use
_zFileName (IN) File to commit (a pattern can be used (e.g : *.txt))
Returns:
the status of the operation

Uninitializes the Package Module

orxDLLAPI orxVOID orxPackage_FindClose ( orxPACKAGE_INFOS *  _pstFileInfos  ) 

Closes a search (free the memory allocated for this search)

Parameters:
_pstFileInfos (IN) Informations returned during search

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxPackage_FindFirst ( orxPACKAGE *  _pstPackage,
orxCONST orxSTRING  _zSearchPattern,
orxPACKAGE_INFOS *  _pstFileInfos 
)

Starts a new search. Find the first file that will match to the given pattern in the package

Parameters:
_pstPackage (IN) Package to use. Can be orxNULL (will search in all opened package)
_zSearchPattern (IN) Pattern to find
_pstFileInfos (OUT) Informations about the first file found
Returns:
orxTRUE if a file has been found, else orxFALSE

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxPackage_FindNext ( orxPACKAGE_INFOS *  _pstFileInfos  ) 

Continues a search. Find the next occurence of a pattern. The search has to be started with orxFile_FindFirst

Parameters:
_pstFileInfos (IN/OUT) Informations about the found file
Returns:
orxTRUE, if the next file has been found, else returns orxFALSE

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxPackage_Init (  ) 

Initializes the Package Module

Returns:
Returns the status of the initialization

orxDLLAPI orxPACKAGE* orxPackage_Open ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zDirPath,
orxCONST orxSTRING  _zPackageName,
orxU32  _u32OpenFlags 
)

Opens a Package

Parameters:
_zDirPath (IN) Directory path where is stored the package to open
_zPackageName (IN) Name of the package
_u32OpenFlags (IN) Open flags (read/write, intern/extern, ...). The package will be created if it doesn't exists and is in write mode
Returns:
a Pointer on a package, or orxNULL if an error has occured.

orxDLLAPI orxU32 orxPackage_Read ( orxVOID *  _pDataToWrite,
orxU32  _u32FileSize,
orxPACKAGE *  _pstPackage,
orxCONST orxSTRING  _zFileName 
)

Reads data from a package and store it in memory

Parameters:
_pDataToWrite (OUT) Pointer where will be stored datas
_u32FileSize (IN) Size of the file (in bytes)
_pstPackage (IN) Pointer on the package descriptor
_zFileName (IN) File to read
Returns:
Returns the number of written bytes

orxU32  _u32FlagsToRemove,
orxU32  _u32FlagsToAdd 
)

Sets package flags

Parameters:
_pstPackage (IN) Package to use
_u32FlagsToRemove (IN) List of flags to remove
_u32FlagsToAdd (IN) List of flags to add

Parameters:
_pstPackage (IN) Package to use
